data.name: Kree Oracle
data.description: A purifier who utilizes Kree technology to regenerate and cleanse his allies.

starItems.name: Kree Oracle
starItems.description: A purifier who utilizes Kree technology to regenerate and cleanse his allies.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

1.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies. If those targets are Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

2.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies. If those targets are Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

3.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies. If those targets are Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

4.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies. If those targets are Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies. If those targets are Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

6.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies. Apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to Ronan and <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns (This does not affect the additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for Ronan and the <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> allies)

7.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to Ronan and <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color> allies.

1.description:
Whenever this character or an ally gains energy, heal them for <color=#86e619>100</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If that target is Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, heal them for <color=#86e619>200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.description:
Whenever this character or an ally gains energy, heal them for <color=#86e619>500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If that target is Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, heal them for <color=#86e619>1,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

3.description:
Whenever this character or an ally gains energy, heal them for <color=#86e619>900</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If that target is Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, heal them for <color=#86e619>1,800</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
Whenever this character or an ally gains energy, heal them for <color=#86e619>1,400</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If that target is Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, heal them for <color=#86e619>2,800</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Whenever this character or an ally gains energy, heal them for <color=#86e619>2,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If that target is Ronan or a <color=#fff568>KREE MINION</color>, heal them for <color=#86e619>4,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
